properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM INQUIRY WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND DELETE_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , I.* FROM (SELECT INQ_NO , INQUIRY_TYPE , TITLE , M.MEMBER_ID , DATE_CREATE , DESCRIPTION , REPLY_CONTENTS , REPLY_DATE FROM INQUIRY I JOIN MEMBER M USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE I.DELETE_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEMBER_NO = 6 ORDER BY DATE_CREATE DESC ) I ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO INQUIRY (INQ_NO , TITLE , DESCRIPTION , DATE_CREATE , INQUIRY_TYPE , MEMBER_NO , DELETE_STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_INQ.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , ? , 'Y')
